name: ISB
description: ISB has successfully put India on the global map of management education by pioneering several new trends in research, promoting innovation and training and nurturing young leaders who not only have an understanding of the developing economies but the society at large.
features: ISB provides opportunities to engage with the best of global management practice and thinking.
ISB became the youngest institution to be ranked among the Top 20 Global B-schools by the Financial Times, London, and since then has been ranked consistently among the top B-schools globally
business_objectives: Accelerate Skill Development and Learning Efficiency
Headline: ISB vision is to be an internationally top-ranked, research-driven, independent management institution that grooms future leaders for India and the world.
ShortDescription: Research-driven B-school that grooms future leaders for India and the world.
enhanced_description: ISB is a research-driven, internationally top-ranked independent management institution (B-school) based in India. It has pioneered new trends in management education, research, and innovation, focusing on training and nurturing young leaders with an understanding of both developing economies and global societal challenges. Recognized for its engagement with global management practices and thinking, ISB has been consistently ranked among the top B-schools globally, including being the youngest institution to be ranked among the Top 20 by the Financial Times, London.
key_use_cases: Developing future leaders for India and the world
Accelerating skill development and learning efficiency for professionals
Providing global management education and exposure to best practices
Enhancing management practice through research and innovation
competitive_advantages: Global recognition and consistent top-tier rankings by institutions like the Financial Times, London
Research-driven approach and pioneering innovation in management education
Focus on leadership development with an understanding of developing economies and broader societal impact
Opportunities for engagement with global management practices and thinking
roi_benefits: Nurturing and development of future leaders
Enhanced understanding of global management practices and developing economies
primary_users: Managers and executives seeking leadership development
Organizations investing in talent development and corporate training
